author: stevenmorgan94
post_text: April 28, 2017 at 5:52 PM#1My current problem:I have presets FOH, FOHX, FOHX2, FOHC, FOH Wide, FOH Spread. These all have different pan values but the tilt is the exact same. I would like a way to replace all of the tilt values in these presets with the tilt value of a different preset (FOH Tilt Master). That way I only have to update a few different presets each day.I have tried: Copy Preset {{Tilt Master}} Attribute "TILT" at Preset {{x THRU x}} Attribute "Tilt"No luck.Also tried: Replace Preset {{ x THRU x}} Attribute "TILT" With Preset {{ Tilt Master}} Attribute "TILT"Only looking to replace the tilt values. Anybody know the proper syntax?Also if you have any suggestions for doing position presets in a different way I'd love to hear them. My basic idea is that I want a couple presets (FOH left, FOH Right, FOH Tilt) to populate more presets based on those values.
title: Replace Preset Attribute With Other Attribute
